entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 01:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow changing through ice pellets and freezing rain to rain early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
